name: NodeBalancer
description: NodeBalancer objects describe a single NodeBalancer on your account.

label._description: The NodeBalancer's display label. Must be 3-32 ASCII characters limited to letters, numbers, underscores, and dashes, starting and ending with a letter, and without two dashes or underscores in a row.

client_conn_throttle._description: Throttle connections per second. 0 to disable, max of 20.
